MemberApps.Dashboard.nameModeratorsActiv.value: This feature is activated upon request. It allows you to name a member as moderator. Write us a short message and we'll process your request promptly.

MemberApps.Dashboard.sendMessageToUnfilt.value: The message will be sent to all members (

MemberApps.Dashboard.writeToMembersActiv.value: This feature is activated upon request. It allows an administrator to send a grouped message to a selection of members. Write us a short message and we'll process your request promptly.

MemberApps.Form.GDPRSummary.value: This information will be visible to the agenda moderators.

MemberApps.Form.confirmRemoveInfo.value: Si quitas de la agenda, dejarás de recibir notificaciones y ya no podrás editar tus eventos ni añadir otros nuevos. La agenda dejará de aparecer en tu pantalla de inicio.

MemberApps.Form.removeFail.value: La solicitud ha fallado. Vuelva a intentarlo en breve. Si el problema persiste, envíenos un breve mensaje a support@openagenda.com

MemberApps.Form.removeSuccess.value: Ya no es miembro de la agenda
